title: Incrase FPS
body: Can anyone please tell me how to incrase FPS! I have a big problem. Everygame i play with 2 FPS and this makes me lose most of my games and have no fun, SO if anyone knows how to incrase FPS please tell me. If i continue playing League of Legends with 2 FPS I will stop playing this game.

replies.body: Your PC could have gone through some general wear and tear if you're seeing abnormal frame drops.  Try out each step in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up!  I hope that helps!
